items.title: VI Live: invaldoelman Oeganda krijgt na tien minuten rood na handbal-actie
items.summary: Dinsdag gaat het weer los in de Premier League. Koploper Arsenal ontvangt Aston Villa, dat zich lijkt te gaan mengen in de titelstrijd, en Manchester United neemt het op tegen hekkensluiter Wolverhampton Wanderers. Op de Afrika Cup zijn vier potjes, en in Schotland zetten Celtic en Rangers hun achtervolging op koploper Heart of Midlothian voort. Volg het belangrijkste voetbal van dinsdag in deze VI Live.

items.title: Premier League summer transfer overperformers: Madueke, Xhaka lead the way
items.summary: Some of last summer's transfers have been vital for their clubs. Here are the 10 players who have most impressed.

items.title: From Liverpool to Chelsea, ranking 8 Premier League clubs' transfer needs
items.summary: Let's look at which Premier League teams need to make moves to improve for the rest of the season.

items.title: Pjanic (35) hangt voetbalschoenen aan de wilgen
items.summary: Miralem Pjanic heeft een einde gemaakt aan zijn voetbalcarri√®re. Dat heeft de 35-jarige Bosni√´r laten weten in een interview met het Italiaanse Tuttosport.

items.title: Uganda v Nigeria: Africa Cup of Nations 2025 ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Afcon updates from the 4pm kick-off (GMT) in Group D ‚öΩ Live scores | Follow us on Bluesky | And email Michael 6 min: Uganda have started well here. Mutyaba, wearing the No 10 shirt, is popping it around with a lot of confidence. 4 min: An early booking for Calvin Bassey, who rugby tackles Ikpeazu to the ground, with the Uganda striker threatening to run through on goal. That is going to be some tussle ‚Äì Bassey and Ikpeazu are both absolute units. From the resulting free-kick, Mato wastes the chance for Uganda with something that was neither a cross nor a shot. Continue reading...

items.title: Hood's record-breaking win knocks out Rock as Clayton avoids upset
items.summary: Justin Hood produced one of the greatest performances at the World Darts Championship by hitting 11 consecutive doubles without missing on his way to a 4-0 win over Josh Rock in the last 16.

items.title: Knieoperatie houdt PSV'er Boadu zes tot acht weken aan de kant
items.summary: Myron Boadu is dinsdag onder het mes gegaan om zijn knieproblemen te verhelpen. PSV verwacht de 24-jarige aanvaller zes tot acht weken te moeten missen.

items.title: Hier wordt gevoetbald op oudjaars- en nieuwjaarsdag
items.summary: De bal rolt, altijd. Zo ook op oudjaars- en nieuwjaarsdag. Voetbalfans kunnen zodoende rond de jaarwisseling genieten van bijvoorbeeld de Premier League en de Afrika Cup. Een overzicht van de wedstrijden.

items.title: 'Alarm bells should be ringing' over England tickets
items.summary: A fan group says "alarm bells should be ringing at Fifa" at England fans not taking up their full allocation for the World Cup final and semi-final.

items.title: England group warns FIFA: WC fans priced out
items.summary: A fans' group says "alarm bells should be ringing" at FIFA with England's fans having failed to take up their full ticket allocation for next summer's World Cup final.

items.title: Ronaldo wants 1k goals; open to Europe return
items.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has reiterated his desire to reach 1,000 career goals before he calls time on his playing career.

items.title: Hakimi returns as Morocco seal AFCON knockouts
items.summary: Africa Cup of Nations hosts Morocco dispatched Zambia 3-0 at a fervid Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium in Rabat on Monday to round off their Group A campaign in style and ease into the round of 16.

items.title: Infantino broedt op grote verandering van buitenspelregel
items.summary: FIFA-voorzitter Gianni Infantino heeft zich opnieuw in de discussie over de buitenspelregel gemengd. Hij sprak tijdens het World Sports Summit in Dubai over mogelijke aanpassingen die het spel aanvallender en aantrekkelijker moeten maken. De kern van zijn boodschap: het zou zomaar kunnen dat een speler in de toekomst pas buitenspel staat als hij volledig voor zijn tegenstander staat.

items.title: Zanetti: Serving Inter and my mission to help the next generation
items.summary: Javier Zanetti lived out his dreams as a player, lifting 16 trophies in an Inter Milan career that spanned a record 858 appearances, winning 145 caps for Argentina, and earning a reputation as one of the best defensive players of his generation.

items.title: 'Absolutely pivotal' - Championship transfer window preview
items.summary: With the winter window opening on 1 January, BBC Sport correspondents assess the transfer needs of the 24 Championship clubs.

items.title: Semenyo‚Äôs move to Manchester City nears as Bournemouth hammer out terms
items.summary: Move could be completed as soon as New Year‚Äôs Day City could let Oscar Bobb or Savinho leave Bournemouth expect Antoine Semenyo‚Äôs transfer to Manchester City to be finalised this week, with the only remaining issue being the payment terms of his release clause. The wide forward‚Äôs clause is worth slightly less than ¬£65m, a sum that includes loyalty money and agent fees. City are thought to want to pay this over three years and Bournemouth believe an agreement will be sealed by Sunday at the latest but possibly as soon as New Year‚Äôs Day. Continue reading...

items.title: Body language and new-ball woes - Broad's verdict on England bowlers
items.summary: England's batters have taken quite the battering after numerous collapses contributed to a fourth successive Ashes series defeat in Australia.

items.title: Crystal Palace agree ¬£35m fee for Brennan Johnson as race for Spurs forward hots up
items.summary: Figure would be a club-record transfer for Palace Johnson yet to decide with Bournemouth also interested Crystal Palace have agreed a club-record ¬£35m fee with Tottenham for Brennan Johnson but are facing strong competition from Bournemouth to sign the Wales forward. Palace are desperate for reinforcements in attack after a punishing schedule that has meant them playing 30 games in all competitions this season because of their Conference League commitments. With the Senegal forward Isma√Øla Sarr away at the Africa Cup of Nations, the club identified Johnson as their primary target for the January window and opened talks with Tottenham several weeks ago. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool set-piece coach Briggs leaves club
items.summary: Liverpool set-piece coach Aaron Briggs leaves the club amid the problems in dead-ball situations this season.

items.title: Johnson to decide future after Palace deal agreed
items.summary: Brennan Johnson is set to decide whether he wants to join Crystal Palace after the south London club agreed a ¬£35m deal to sign the Tottenham attacker.
